cause.description:
The Gateway Project is a massive highway and bridge expansion project that will increase on road greenhouse gas emissions by 31%. It will also destroy 1000 acres of farmland, alter Burns Bog permanently and have negative affects on human health.
1. The Gateway Project will increase ghg emissions
2. Transit must be expaned to offer choice to commuters
3. There are more sustainable alternatives than expansion of Delta Port.
cause.mission: Cancel the expansion of highway one and the SFPR road and expand transit instead.
cause.name: Stop the Gateway Project
